Name: Foreign Cask
Description: This cask is of a foreign make. It can ferment soybeans and rice.

Produce.Name: Kimchi
Produce.Description: Most commonly made from cabbage mixed with spicy seasonings.

SpecialProduce.Name: Miso Paste
SpecialProduce.Description: A paste made from soybeans. Used to make soup.

SpecialProduce.Name: Natto
SpecialProduce.Description: A sticky, fermented snack often eaten for breakfast.
